review: I am satisfied with the consultation with doctor except for one thing that I want to bring to the notice is the consultation fee shown in practo and in reality is varying to the extent of almost double. Even after prior booking, staff at Apollo hospital is charging emergency charge and other hidden charges. The  same was enquired with the staff to which he told that there is no affiliation of practo with the hospital even after showing the message that I received from Practo and Apollo hospital both about the confirmation of appointment. This is misleading to people and should have clarity on the same.

Hi all my father admitted for pain in bladder on 8th of June.. Sharad sheker treated him for what reason i don't know.one of the medicine given by her has spelling mistake i request her to tell me what it must be her response was very rude n she didn't agree that she wrote it.. the billing is also very high for her checking up .. *** ******** **** ***** *** **** ** ****** ***i request all my friends not to go to her for check up * *** ** **** ** ****** * **** ** ***** * ********* ******* ** ** ******* **** *** *** **** ** **  ****** ******* ******

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: Loved the experience, she was really friendly and gentle. She gave me time and actually understood the issues. She gave me her phone number to reach out once the test reports come so that I don't have to travel all the way again in sickness.
Very friendly and helpful advice. Overall, I was happy with the guidance she gave on what next to be done to improve my health .
